mapper.sql: MENU_ID as menuId , PMSN_CD as pmsnCd, PARENT_ID as parentId, MENU_PRT_IDS as menuPrtIds, MENU_NM as menuNm, SORT_LVL as sortLvl, HREF as href, ICON_NM as iconNm, RESOURCE_TYPE as resourceType, APP_CODE as appCode, VALID_IND as validInd
mapper.select:
select
from RM_SYS_MENU_INFO where RESOURCE_TYPE is not null and VALID_IND='1'

select me.MENU_ID as id , me.MENU_NM as name, me.RESOURCE_TYPE as type from RM_SYS_USER_POST_REL rel left join RM_SYS_MENU_INFO me on rel.POST_CD=me.MENU_ID where me.RESOURCE_TYPE in ('01','02') and me.VALID_IND='1' and rel.USER_ID=#{userId} order by me.SORT_LVL

select
from (select distinct me.menu from ( (select POST_CD as menu,USER_ID as userId from RM_SYS_USER_POST_REL) UNION ALL (select pe.PMSN_CD as menu,rel.USER_ID as userId from RM_SYS_ROLE_PESN pe left join rm_sys_user_role_rel rel on rel.ROLE_ID=pe.ROLE_ID) ) me where me.userId =#{userId} ) men join RM_SYS_MENU_INFO f on men.menu=f.MENU_ID and VALID_IND='1' where f.RESOURCE_TYPE in ('02','05') order by f.MENU_ID,f.SORT_LVL

select parentId,GROUP_CONCAT(menuId) as menuIds,menuNm,iconNm from ( (select fz.PARENT_ID as parentId,GROUP_CONCAT(distinct fz.MENU_ID) menuId,s.MENU_NM as menuNm,s.ICON_NM as iconNm from (select distinct me.menu from ( (select POST_CD as menu,USER_ID as userId from RM_SYS_USER_POST_REL) UNION ALL (select pe.PMSN_CD as menu,rel.USER_ID as userId from RM_SYS_ROLE_PESN pe left join rm_sys_user_role_rel rel on rel.ROLE_ID=pe.ROLE_ID) ) me where me.userId =#{userId} ) men left join RM_SYS_MENU_INFO f on men.menu=f.MENU_ID and RESOURCE_TYPE='05' and f.VALID_IND='1' join RM_SYS_MENU_INFO fz on f.PARENT_ID=fz.MENU_ID and fz.VALID_IND='1' join RM_SYS_MENU_INFO s on s.MENU_ID=fz.PARENT_ID and s.VALID_IND='1' group by fz.PARENT_ID) union all (select f.PARENT_ID as parentId,f.MENU_ID as menuId,s.MENU_NM as menuNm,s.ICON_NM as iconNm from (select distinct me.menu from ( (select POST_CD as menu,USER_ID as userId from RM_SYS_USER_POST_REL) UNION ALL (select pe.PMSN_CD as menu,rel.USER_ID as userId from RM_SYS_ROLE_PESN pe left join rm_sys_user_role_rel rel on rel.ROLE_ID=pe.ROLE_ID) ) me where me.userId =#{userId} ) men left join RM_SYS_MENU_INFO f on men.menu=f.MENU_ID and RESOURCE_TYPE='04' and f.VALID_IND='1' join RM_SYS_MENU_INFO s on s.MENU_ID=f.PARENT_ID and s.VALID_IND='1') ) ch group by ch.parentId,menuNm,iconNm
